review: Since I'm a huge Amazon fan, I love that the Amazon Fire TV opens with Amazon Prime already connected. The image quality is excellent. I wasn't sure about the voice commands, but it is fun. It took me a little while to figure out that the voice commands only search Amazon. However, if you want to open Netflix or Hulu, you can press the microphone button and say the name to open them. I bought this to replace an old Roku and because of the comparison charts that are on Amazon. The Fire TV won the comparison.By the way, set up is incredibly easy!
